jobDescription: Trainee Engineers receive training across various engineering divisions (Process, Mechanical, Piping, Control & Instrumentation, Electrical, Civil, Heat Transfer and Applied Technology), encompassing activities like process data sheet preparation, P&ID updates, hydraulic studies, design, requisition, vendor print checking of equipment, plant layout, 3D modeling, material specification, piping stress analysis, system studies, inspection, construction planning, and more. Training methods include classroom training, on-job training, software usage, site visits, and vendor shop visits.
